snippet: Dr. Avery was a medical researcher who made a single, crucial discovery about newborns’ ability to breathe.
abstract: Dr Mary Ellen Avery, medical researcher whose discovery helped save many premature infants, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Avery was a medical researcher who made a single, crucial discovery about newborns’ ability to breathe.
